rooms.name: Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space with integrated dining area featuring Bohemian design elements such as eclectic furniture, vibrant textiles, and floor-to-ceiling windows that ensure ample natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. It includes modern fixtures, energy-efficient appliances on a tight budget and Bohemian decor elements such as exposed brick or reclaimed wood finishes.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom with essential fixtures. Designed to maximize space on a tight budget, incorporating Vastu principles for water element balance.

openings.name: Front Entrance
openings.description: Vastu-compliant main entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows that invite natural light, ensuring a welcoming and vibrant atmosphere.

openings.name: Side Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance that leads to a small storage or utility area. It is designed keeping local building norms in mind.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a Bohemian aesthetic featuring vibrant colours and patterns, floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, and Vastu-aligned positioning.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom. Designed with a modest budget in mind but ensuring essential functionality and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Small balcony that provides access to the master bedroom, featuring a railing design in line with local building norms and Vastu principles.
